author: ghudson
msg: In the FS abstraction branch, make most of the tree build again by
modifying build.conf, disabling the get_library_vtable implementation,
* build.conf: Don't expect libsvn_fs to have subdirs.
subversion/libsvn_fs/fs.h: Fix typos and other small errors

author: ghudson
msg: In the FS abstraction branch, add an abstract type for history
objects, and fill in the history functions in the loader framework.
(history_vtable_t): New type, defines the two history functions.

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, define a straw-man FS loader framework,
and define some generic functions to create or operate on an FS.
(fs_library_vtable_t): New vtable type for top-level functions which
operate on a repository by path.  Also contains BDB-specific
(fs_vtable_t): Take create, open, delete, and recover out of here and
move them to the library vtable type.  recover will be
(get_library_vtable): New function to map an FSAP name to a vtable.
Current implementation is just a cheesy placeholder.
(fs_library_vtable): New function to get the vtable for an existing
(write_fsap_name): New function to record the FSAP name of a new
svn_fs_hotcopy): Implement new functions using loader framework.
using loader framework; restrict to baseline provider.

author: jpieper
msg: Implement several APIs in FSFS that are not necessary for commits.
(svn_fs_berkeley_recover): This is a no-op for FSFS.
the filename of a representation in an uncommitted transaction.
headers to match the rest of fs_fs.c
(svn_fs__fs_list_transactions): New, returns a list of uncommitted
(svn_fs__fs_open_txn): New, returns a svn_fs_txn_t for a given
(svn_fs__fs_txn_proplist): New, returns the entire property list for
Implement using the corresponding newly added FSFS functions.

author: ehu
msg: A few more message tweaks and a correction for r9482.
Change back incorrectness introduced in r9482.
Reintroduce a space in a help message removed by mistake in r9482.
